Dec 22 (Reuters) - :
*AMAZON LIMITS HOW MANY COVID TESTS YOU CAN BUY AMID OMICRON SURGE - CNBC *AMAZON HAS LIMITED THE NUMBER OF PURCHASES OF ITS OWN AT-HOME PCR TEST KIT TO 10 UNITS PER SHOPPER- CNBC

  • ((reuters.briefs@thomsonreuters.com;))

((Reuters Investor Briefs; email: reutersinvestor.briefs@thomsonreuters.com)) Source Date/Time = 22-DEC-202114:00:00.64 GMT
